text: Would be nice if the Choice field in Custom Modules was able to be multiselect or use checkboxes. I can use booleans to choose between multiple options but when there are several options it would just look much cleaner if they were all in one field.
I believe they actually added a multi-select field recently as it’s own field type
maybe I’m just thinking of HubDB though
I checked each field and didn't see any multiselect options in Custom Modules, but yea, HubDB has one.

would love it if `page_title` could be a part of the *Allowed JSON fields in the body* for the `Create a New Page` and `Update a Page` endpoints for CMS Page Publishing API.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/post_pages>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/put_pages_page_id>
